about_the_game:
Play as Pippin, a courageous bunny on a mission to save his beloved garden from a sudden band of invading foxes. Embark on an unforgettable adventure filled with exploration, mystery, and heartwarming friendships.

Adventure & Exploration


Traverse a stunning 2D world and immerse yourself in a wild garden teeming with secrets. Uncover the truth behind a sudden fox invasion that has thrown your once-peaceful home into chaos. Make new friends, lend a helping paw to your neighbors, and unlock new areas filled with secrets.

Find special items and abilities


Every corner of the garden holds surprises, and as you delve deeper, you'll stumble upon special items and unique abilities that will aid you in overcoming obstacles. Unlock doors, sneak past enemies, and overcome them with your wit.

Help your neighbors


Your journey is not a solitary one. Meet NPCs and help your neighbors to advance Pippin's quest for peace. Each friend you meet has their own story to tell and unique ways of helping Pippin along his journey.



Ready to explore Pippin's Mysterious Garden? Make sure to ✨ wishlist now✨ and get ready for a short and sweet experience 💚

name: Pippin's Mysterious Garden

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Very light software. Should be able to run on most PCs.

short_description: Explore the whimsical world of Pippin in this short, 2D adventure and exploration game. Traverse a wild garden, uncover secrets, discover treasures, and meet adorable NPCs in this enchanting storybook world.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*, Portuguese - Portugal*
*languages with full audio support
